overview: Three bachelors have been very close since their childhood and they are putting their efforts to find their soulmates in their hometown. The curse of "Lambat Sunat, Lambatlah Kahwin" often plays on their minds and this makes it harder for them to find their soulmates as they keep facing various setbacks. Set against the unique culture and traditions of the Minangkabau in Negeri Sembilan.
title: Gadis Jolobu
